info.name: Hercules DJ Console MK1
info.author: zestoi changes for mk1 by ewanuno
info.description: Native high-resolution HID script for the Hercules DJ Console MK1 controller.

option.label: Use the pitch bend buttons as jog wheels
option.description: This will change the pitch bend buttons to behave like the jog wheels, scratching when the track is paused or seeking when the track is playing.

option.label: Use the gain encoder for setting the tempo
option.description: This will change the gain encoder to modify the tempo instead.
